events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer position.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to the candidate's background as a developer and software experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate’s progress through the software engineer recruitment workflow.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong software development knowledge.
The candidate responded promptly and showed enthusiasm for the next steps, expressing particular interest in the DevOps aspects of the role.
Technical interview has been scheduled for next week to further assess the candidate’s engineering and software development skills.
